projects.title: Circulo en el avatar generator
projects.info: I made this on my free time, while Argentina was debating the legalization of abortion. On social networks, anyone supporting this would put green colored circle on their profile picture, but I noticed lots of people that didn't know how to do this easily without relying on apps or using programs on their computers. So in six hours, I coded this simple webpage that lets you upload a photo and put a customizable circle to use it in any social network later on. The site was quite a success, and was used by plenty of people.

projects.title: Les Luthiers PHP-Template Based Web
projects.info: This is a college project that I was required to do for PHP class. It's a webpage based on the comedic band Les Luthiers designed from scratch by me. The navigation is entirely based on PHP includes by having a main skeleton and various templates that load into view as required.
